document.full_text: by 2015 more than two million people will contract a form of tuberculosis (tb) resistant to standard drugs and the fight against it must be stepped up, the world health organization said on wednesday.
document.title: drug-resistant tb to affect 2 million by 2015: who
lines_and_colors: by 2015 more than two million people will contract a form of tuberculosis (tb) resistant to standard drugs and the fight against it must be stepped up, the world health organization said on wednesday.
